Uses of Class
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.Player

Packages that use Player
Package
Description
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model
Classes that implement the model of the server of the Masters of Renaissance game.
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.cardrequirements
This package contains the implementation of the card requirements of Masters of Renaissance.
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.leadercards
This package contains the implementation of the leader cards of Masters of Renaissance.
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.resourcetransactions
This package contains the implementation of the resource transactions of Masters of Renaissance.
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.resourcetypes
This package contains the implementation of the resource types of Masters of Renaissance.
